---
title: "Weekly Checklist"
---

Use this checklist for each journal entry:

- [ ] Defined method and when to use it  
- [ ] Parametric equivalent (or none) stated  
- [ ] Hypotheses $H_0$ and $H_A$ written in context  
- [ ] Test statistic / p-value explained  
- [ ] R function(s) and example included  
- [ ] Homework example + contextual interpretation  
- [ ] Writing is clear and professional
